title: Van der Poel Crushes All in Koksijde ‘Cross, Van Aert Battles for Third
content:
Van der Poel steamrollers the CX elite on iconic sandy course for ninth win in nine, fellow world champ Van Empel dominates women's.

Read the full article at Van der Poel Crushes All in Koksijde ‘Cross, Van Aert Battles for Third on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
